answers.answer: My water broke on my edd but I delivered the day after.
Well... I didn't go a week late... since we were induced, she was born 2 days "late" :)
I didn't vote cause i was induced 2 weeks early, due to placenta no longer working (gestational diabetes). We worked so hard to keep him in from 26 weeks on....i bet i would've went overdue!
Had my little guy exactly one week early! I was induced tho

maybe we could have a list of members due dates, birth dates(or still waiting), and of course all the extra bits of info about the gorgeous new little ones (sex, weight, name, whatever you want to add)? Mines not very exciting to start the list though, but here goes.

question: Just wondering who else delivered on the EDD. The doctor told me that I am part of the 3% of women that actally go on the due date.
title: Who delivered on their due date?
